com.vgrs.xcode.common
Class UnicodeSequence

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.vgrs.xcode.common.UnicodeSequence
public class UnicodeSequence
extends java.lang.Object

Allows manipulation of arrays of integer primitives. Supports appending and inserting of integer primitives into the sequence. The actual sequence is not constructed until the get method is called, so each manipulation can be done with less data reorganization.

insert

public void insert(int i,
                   int offset)
Insert an integer to this unicode sequence at the indicated offset.
The offset argument must be greater or equals to 0 and less then or equal to the length of this unicode sequence.
Parameters:
i - integer array to be added
offset - the offset

insert

public void insert(int[] i,
                   int offset)
Insert all integers in an integer array to this unicode sequence at the indicated offset.

offset - the offset

length

public int length()
Returns the length of this unicode sequence. The length is equals to the number of integer array in the sequence.

equals

public boolean equals(UnicodeSequence other)
Compars this UnicodeSequence object the specified UnicodeSequence. The result is true only if the specified UnicodeSequence is not null and contains the same sequence of integer array as this object.
Parameters:
other - the UnicodeSequence object to compare with this object
Returns:
true if the specified UnicodeSequence is equal, otherwise false
